content: आशी [आशीर्यतेऽनया, आ-शॄ-क्विप् पृ°] {@--1@} A serpent's fang. {@--2@} A kind of venom. {@--3@} A blessing, benediction.

आशी {c2c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To lie or sleep on; कुसुमान्याशेरते षट्पदाः <ls>V. 2. 23</ls> <ab>v. l.</ab> {@--2@} To pass (the night) in sleep. {@--3@} To wish, pray for. {@--4@} To dwell, live, inhabit.
